headline: RBC starts Becton Dickinson at Sector Perform, sees limited upside until 2027
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets initiated coverage of Becton, Dickinson and Company with a Sector Perform rating and a $211 price target, saying the medical device maker’s growth acceleration is more likely to come after 2026.

raw.headline: RBC starts Becton Dickinson at Sector Perform, sees limited upside until 2027

headline: Why BD (BDX) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of medical technology company Becton, Dickinson and Company (NYSE:BDX) fell 4.2% in the morning session after RBC Capital initiated coverage on the company with a neutral 'Sector Perform' rating.
